about_the_game:
Barbara Lee has just found out that her girlfriend has been cheating on her and wants to break up. Distraught, she goes out for drinks with her best friend Cassandra to try to comfort herself. Cassandra, who is a very social person, tells Barbara about some cool places she knows where Barbara can probably meet someone new so she can forget about her problems. Cassandra convinces Barbara that she should put less priority on work, to socialise more and eventually go on more dates to help her get over her ex-girlfriend. Join Barbara on this adventure around the Big Apple and let’s see what adventures she will go on.

“Manhattan Dolls” is a comedic yuri dating sim where you spend a wild weekend exploring all the different corners of Manhattan to find lesbian women to charm. This game is both a love letter to New York City and the wonders of lesbian love!

Featuring

- A comedic and heart-warming storyline
- Jazz Fusion Soundtrack
- Three distinct endings
- A true love letter to Manhattan and New York City. Explore the Big Apple!

content_descriptors.notes: There is frequent talk about adult romantic relationships, infidelity and intimacy. This game depicts romantic and intimate relationships between lesbian women. Given that a lot of the game takes place in bars, a lot of alcohol is shown to be consumed.

name: Manhattan Dolls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
